p: Smooth muscle cells are a prominent target of diverse natural products with different bioactivities (Hnatyszyn et al., 2003; Uhrin et al., 2018). Sándor et al. assessed the relaxant effects or contracting activity of the hydroethanolic extract, fractions, phytoconstituents, and essential oil of Roman chamomile on smooth muscle preparations. The authors found that the essential oil of the plant possessed a good smooth muscle-relaxant effect ( Sándor et al.).
